__e: Therefore, if all of these events have come to pass, should we not also expect the fulfilment of His greatest promise?
My son was killed in the performance of his duty, Ellen.
But he fell in the line of duty.
You are responsible to God to fulfill this mission.
You now have ten minutes and 19 seconds in which to perform your task.
It certainly isn't all you ever wished for. Tell me the truth.
He has a dream, and it's our job to make it come true.
[Chuckles] Now, tell me how I can help you, please, because I am dying to make your dreams come true.

And I'd love nothing more than for you to stay and watch that come to fruition.
